prompt:
USER: 
Title of the statistic:
Which of the following , if any , would persuade you to book a vacation during the coronavirus outbreak ?
Columns of the statistic:
Share of respondents
Statistic:
Share of respondents = {'A travel insurance policy that covered disruption caused by the virus': '20%', 'Flight discounts': '20%', 'Flexibility': '16%', 'Accommodation discounts': '16%', 'Taking a trip within my own country instead': '16%', 'If the situation in the UK became worse': '8%', 'No change fees': '14%', 'Attraction discounts': '9%', 'Being able to speak to an agent about safest/most effective travel plans': '8%', 'I could not be persuaded to book a vacation during this time': '48%'}
Generate a caption that describes the statistic.
ASSISTANT:
output: During the coronavirus outbreak, 20% of respondents were persuaded to book a vacation due to the availability of a travel insurance policy that covered disruptions caused by the virus. Additionally, 20% of respondents were enticed by flight discounts, while 16% were attracted by accommodation discounts. However, only 8% of respondents were persuaded to book a vacation if the situation in the UK became worse. Furthermore, 14% of respondents were swayed by the option of no change fees, and 9% were attracted by attraction discounts. Lastly, 8% of respondents were persuaded to book a vacation if they could speak to an agent about the safest and most effective travel plans. Notably, 48% of respondents were not persuaded to book a vacation during this time.
